entry.title: Combined summary - bitcoind replies 500 error
entry.summary: The user is experiencing issues while setting up pushpool with bitcoind. They are unable to connect to pushpool using cpuminer due to a JSON-RPC call failure. Upon checking the pushpool server log, they discover an upstream RPC error. The user has attempted to resolve the issue by changing ports and rebooting the server but to no avail.To provide further insight, the user has shared their bitcoind config and pushpool config files. However, it remains unclear what specific changes have been made to these files.In order to troubleshoot the issue effectively, it may be necessary to review the pushpool server log in more depth and investigate any potential conflicts between the configurations of bitcoind and pushpool. It may also be helpful to consult online resources or seek assistance from experienced individuals within the relevant community to resolve this issue.
